name: Wish You Were Here (cysdavis)
description:
Welcome to your breakup.

In this remote two player roleplaying game, you will be interviewed by Constellation, the dating app you met each other on, about ending your very long distance relationship. This interview will be conducted entirely via video messages. The video must not be live. There is no live video when one person is on Earth and the other is on Europa. 

The original version of this game was created for the 200 Word RPG Challenge in 2018. It has been substantially updated since then. In addition to the PDF, there is also an accompanying video with the interview questions.
